definition: to shift one's affection/to change sentiment
to move/to shift/to change/to alter/to remove
change of affection, shift of love (idiom); to change one's feelings to another love/to fall in love with sb else

sentences.english: Empathy has motivation function and information function for the decision-making on prosocial behavior.
sentences.chinese: 移情对亲社会行为决策具有动机功能和信息功能。

sentences.english: The correlation between altruistic behavior and empathic ability of college students is extremely notable.
sentences.chinese: 大学生利他行为与移情能力的相关性极其显著。
我再无移情别恋的负罪感。

sentences.english: Now, we know certain things about this empathy, some which might be surprising.
sentences.chinese: 我们对移情有一定的了解，有些了解会让你吃一惊。

sentences.english: And if she finds that she would like to move into love with somebody else, it is perfectly okay.
sentences.chinese: 如果她发现她要移情别恋，那也完全没问题。

sentences.english: I can feel this shape-shifting developing my empathy.
sentences.chinese: 我能感觉到这种移形大法在发展我的移情。

sentences.english: They are simply based more on the past than on the here-and-now.
sentences.chinese: 只是移情和反移情更多是基于过去而非此时此刻。

sentences.english: They are simply based more on the past than on the here-and-now.
sentences.chinese: 只是移情和反移情更多是基于过去而非此时此刻。

sentences.english: Mark knew that his goose was cooked when his girlfriend found him dating another girl.
sentences.chinese: 当马克被女友发现他移情别恋时，他知道自己完了。

sentences.english: Cats, unlike dogs or even elephants, aren't associated with altruistic, empathic behavior.
sentences.chinese: 猫儿不像狗或是大象那样具有利他的，移情的行为。

sentences.english: It's definitely difficult to see him move on so quickly.
sentences.chinese: 真的很难接受看见他那么快便移情别恋。

sentences.english: The nocturne, written by Chopin, can change people's feelings.
sentences.chinese: 肖邦的《夜曲》是一部能够移情的作品。

sentences.english: Some of us have a lot of it.
sentences.chinese: 有些人有强烈的移情能力。

sentences.english: It's also empathy and joyfulness and purpose inner traits that have transcendent worth.
sentences.chinese: 移情，快乐，目标和内部特质同样也有卓越的价值。

sentences.english: And people differ in the extent to which they feel empathy.
sentences.chinese: 不同的人感受到的移情程度也不同。

sentences.english: After the husband leaves prison loves another, makes her to die by heartbreak.
sentences.chinese: 丈夫出狱后移情别恋，令她伤心欲绝。

definition: change of affection, shift of love (idiom); to change one's feelings to another love/to fall in love with sb else
emotion/sentiment/affection/feelings between two persons/CL:個|个[ge4],種|种[zhong3]
in love with/to feel deeply attached to
sb who is romantically involved with sb already in a committed relationship/the other woman/the other man/third person/third party (in dispute)/disinterested party/number three in a list
